file_content.text: Sith, General Gesselle sends her greetings and thanks. Reports of House Ulgo's retreat are already widespread.
Unfortunately, she regrets she will not be able to receive you at her command center.
In light of your previous intrusion, and the likelihood of you deciding to destroy her after getting what you seek, she has wisely relocated her base of operations.
She owes me.
Indeed. The reward was information, I'm told.
She better not renege.
And she owes you information, I am told.
Smart woman.
General Gesselle is nothing if not wise and practical.
The General toyed with the idea of refusing you, in fact I counseled her to that effect. But the woman's integrity is unimpeachable.
I've been directed to inform you that Jaesa Willsaam's parents are servants in Castle Organa. This transmission includes a pass code that will gain you entrance to their quarters.
Are you lying to me?
Doubt it all you like. I'd like nothing more.
It will do.
You didn't expect her to just hand them over, did you?
This completes the General's alliance with you. She is warning Castle Organa of your intentions as we speak. They will be ready.
A difficult task awaits, then.
Indeed. And as we speak, the General is warning Castle Organa of your intentions.
You are returned to enemy status, and Gesselle sincerely hopes that her brethren will be the end of you.
End transmission.
